com.wx.grammar.cnf.rule

Class ProductionRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wx.grammar.cnf.rule.CnfRule
      • com.wx.grammar.cnf.rule.ProductionRule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Symbol>

    public class ProductionRule
extends CnfRule
implements java.lang.Iterable<Symbol>
    This class represents a production rule or an epsilon rule.
    • A := BC...
    • S := ε

      • ProductionRule

        public ProductionRule(Symbol symbol,
                      java.util.List<Symbol> elements)
        Constructs a new rule.
        A rule in Chomsky Normal Form is formed with a concatenation of symbols.
        Parameters:
        symbol - Symbol of the rule
        elements - Concatenation of symbols (or empty list for an epsilon rule)
